actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from the Department of Health and Human Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to require that priority be given to funding programs of national significance.

summary.text: Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to require the Director of the ACTION Agency, in making grants under the Retired Senior Volunteer Program, to give priority to programs of national significance, such as afterschool library literacy, guardianship monitoring, and respite care programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to require that priority be given to funding programs of national significance.
